channel.title: [Project Lol V2] Ice Barrage [HELP]
channel.description:
Hello,
i downloaded the server Project Lol V2 and i like the server so much i was looking for one like this so long, but where i was afraid of, that the ice barrage doesn't bind, and guess what, he doens't bind, only 1 sec, can someone tell me (DETAILED) how to make it bind for 30 seconds?
Thx,
Zephy[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 12:46:17 PM[/size][hr]Anyone could help me :(:s?
Post a link of a tutorial about it or tell me how to fix it? Thanks, Zeph[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 06:33:33 AM[/size][hr]Where are the 'major' coders now :(?
Help :s[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 08:08:00 AM[/size][hr]o.O

item.title: [Project Lol V2] Ice Barrage [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

No, it would be the entangledelay = 1;
Change it to whatever you want…

The void entangle is just a custom void with a custom delay…
They need a void/string
entangle(40,430)
Meaning, 40 second entangle, with the grafix Id of 430…

Anyone wanna make?

Read full topic
